alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion; McPherson; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 9:42AM CST until January 02 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Total additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Rice, McPherson, Marion and Chase Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will occur this morning, with lighter snow after that.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
